ServiceSid.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/chat/rest/services) to delete the resource from.

ChannelSid.description: The unique ID of the [Channel](https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/chat/rest/channels) the message belongs to.  Can be the Channel's `sid` or `unique_name`.

Sid.description: The Twilio-provided string that uniquely identifies the Member resource to delete.
